definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Income luggage was happy to be your shadow installed between heart.
sentences.chinese: 把曾經的快樂收入行囊，將你的身影裝在心間。

sentences.english: If I see you next to never. How can I say forever?
sentences.chinese: 如果我看不到你的身影，又怎能說天長地久？

sentences.english: Existing beaked whale populations are found in nearly every ocean.
sentences.chinese: 在每個大洋幾乎都能見到突吻鯨的身影。

sentences.english: Her shadow slenderized under the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 在月光下她的身影變得細長。

sentences.english: And look upon my self and curse my fate.
sentences.chinese: 顧盼着身影，詛咒自己的生辰。

sentences.english: My mother 's slender figure is deeply engraved in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽纖瘦的身影深深地印在我的腦海裏。

sentences.english: With snarls and a blur of motion THEY ATTACK.
sentences.chinese: 隨着咆哮聲和模糊的身影，他們發動了攻擊。

sentences.english: Again under the cherry tree came the little figure of Tim who was playing the violin with his head tilted.
sentences.chinese: 櫻桃樹下又出現了蒂姆歪着腦袋拉琴的小小身影。

sentences.english: His faithful father was always in the stands, always with words of encouragement for him.
sentences.chinese: 不變的是看臺上父親忠實的身影，雷打不動的鼓勵。

sentences.english: Today these spreading routs are no longer extant.
sentences.chinese: 但是今日這些傳播途徑已不復見孔子的身影。

sentences.english: It is my greatest pity that we can't see you on the final Team competetion court.
sentences.chinese: 最後一屆團體賽看不到你的身影這是我最大的遺憾。

sentences.english: During the break, you can see her swift figure in the playground.
sentences.chinese: 休息時，你可以在操場上看見她矯捷的身影。

sentences.english: If i see you next to neve , How can i say forever?
sentences.chinese: 如果我看不到你的身影，又怎能說天長地久？

sentences.english: The brawny big tree had cast a deep impression in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 古楓樹那粗壯厚實的身影已深深地印在我的腦海裏。

sentences.english: When I arrived at Limmeridge House, there was no sign of Mr Fairlie.
sentences.chinese: 我到了梨彌蕤界宅院，沒有芾利先生的身影。

sentences.english: These sharks occur in all tropical and subtropical ocean regions around the globe.
sentences.chinese: 在熱帶和亞熱帶海域都能發現它們的身影。
